messages.content: A modern apartment in Montenegro with a panoramic sea view. A bright, spacious living room with a calm, elegant interior. A mother and her son are sitting on the sofa, a blanket and soft cushions nearby, creating a feeling of warmth and closeness. There is a sense of quiet celebration in the air, with the New Year just around the corner and the home filled with comfort and a peaceful family atmosphere.

usage_example.python:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI()

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4o",
    max_tokens=4096,
    messages=[
        {"role": "system", "content": """A modern apartment in Montenegro with a panoramic sea view. A bright, spacious living room with a ca..."""},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
